summary: This bill, the Public Safety Officer Concussion and Traumatic Brain Injury Health Act of 2025, mandates the Secretary of Health and Human Services to collect and disseminate information on concussions and traumatic brain injuries among public safety officers. This includes research on evidence-based practices, medical information, and dissemination to medical professionals, employers, mental health professionals, patients, families, and institutions of higher education. The Secretary is also authorized to support efforts to develop model guidelines and protocols for treatment through grants and agreements.
